{{Infobox Song |歌曲名= Caffeine(feat. Lamar Hall) |image= |图片信息= |图片大小= |演唱= Jeff Williams
Casey Lee Williams
Lamar Hall |作曲= Jeff Williams |填词= Jeff Williams |编曲= |MV编导= |收录专辑= }} 《'''Caffeine'''》是动画《RWBY》的插曲，由Jeff Williams、Casey Lee Williams、Lamar Hall演唱，收录于专辑《RWBY, Vol.2(Original Soundtrack & Score)》中。 == 简介 == 一首放荡不羁的歌曲，摇滚风，rap，[[Coco Adel]]的角色歌。 == 歌曲 == 文件:05 Caffeine (feat. Lamar Hall) - Rwby - Jeff Williams & Casey Lee Williams.mp3 == 歌词 == {{LyricsKai|lstyle=color:|rstyle=color:;|reserveWidth=300px |original= '''Jeff Williams唱：'''
Listen up strap in notify your next of kin You're about to take a ride a little on the blazing side Guzzle down your red bull you're gonna need a bucket full You're watching me accelerate and tear apart the interstate A certified monster I'm an absolute trip Like Otis Redding hard to handle so you better get a grip A super-fast superfly bonafide wise guy Call the morgue and say goodbye write your will it's time to die '''Jeff Williams、Casey Lee Williams合唱：'''
Caffeine, I'm caffeine Caffeine, I'm caffeine I'm a bad dream I'm a rad scene I'm a tad mean But I'm not afraid to take you out(afraid to take you out) Afraid to take you out (afraid to take you out) Afraid to take you out (afraid to take you out) Afraid to take you out (afraid to take you out) '''Casey Lee Williams唱：'''
I'm a cheetah on the plains I'm the highway star A supersonic princess in a million dollar car Blood on fire pumping through my veins Weaving in and out while I'm bolting through the lanes I'm hyperdrive overdrive hit the gas at fifty-five Breakneck trainwreck in my presence genuflect Track-roundin' speed-a-soundin' electrifyin' pulse-poundin' Heart-pumpin' brain-thumpin' watch me get the party jumpin' Caffeine, I'm caffeine(Caffeine) Caffeine, I'm caffeine(Caffeine) I'm a bad dream I'm a rad scene I'm a tad mean But I'm not afraid to take you out(afraid to take you out) Afraid to take you out (afraid to take you out) Afraid to take you out (afraid to take you out) Afraid to take you out (afraid to take you out) Afraid to take you out (afraid to take you out) Afraid to take you out '''Lamar Hall说唱：'''
Yo, listen up I hope you like it hot Grab yourself a mug 'cuz I made a fresh pot Come and get a dose of my kickass java Fuelin' your addiction with this thick black lava We can do up an espresso, or the cappucino way Sure to get your fix, venti or grande Sugar, Splenda, Equal, maybe Sweet'N Low Everybody's happy when they hanging with Joe Let's go '''Jeff Williams、Casey Lee Williams合唱：'''
Caffeine, I'm caffeine(Caffeine) Caffeine(Yow!),Caffeine I'm a bad dream I'm a rad scene I'm a tad mean But I'm not afraid to take you out(afraid to take you out) Afraid to take you out (afraid to take you out) Afraid to take you out (afraid to take you out) Afraid to take you out (afraid to take you out) |translated=
乖乖听着，系好安全带，告诉你的家人 你就要去耀眼的地方兜个风了 把你的红牛一口干了，你需要满满一桶 你目睹着我加速之后蹂躏州际公路 一个确实的怪物，我绝对值得体验 像奥蒂斯•瑞丁那样难以掌控，所以你最好抓紧了 一个超快又惹眼、诚实又聪明的家伙 给太平间打个电话说声再见，写下遗愿就赴死吧
咖啡因，我是咖啡因 咖啡因，我是咖啡因 我是糟糕的梦 我越看越酷炫 我顽皮又淘气 但我不怕带你出去疯（怕带你出去疯） 怕带你出去疯（怕带你出去疯） 怕带你出去疯（怕带你出去疯） 怕带你出去疯（怕带你出去疯）
我是平原上的猎豹，我是高速之星 一个超音速的公主开着百万豪车 燃烧的血液在血管里翻滚 我左突右进飞越所有车道 我用超光速狂奔，油门踩到五十五 危险也好怪胎也罢，在我面前全都跪下 绕着跑道呼啸而过，兴奋飞驰脉搏猛跳 心脏搏动大脑鼓动，看着我让派对跃动 咖啡因，我是咖啡因（咖啡因） 咖啡因，我是咖啡因（咖啡因） 我是糟糕的梦 我越看越酷炫 我顽皮又淘气 但我不怕带你出去疯（怕带你出去疯） 怕带你出去疯（怕带你出去疯） 怕带你出去疯（怕带你出去疯） 怕带你出去疯（怕带你出去疯） 怕带你出去疯（怕带你出去疯） 怕带你出去疯
哟，听着 我希望你喜欢热的 自己去拿个杯子，因为我泡了壶新的 过来弄一杯我神奇的爪哇咖啡 对这厚黑的熔岩开始上瘾吧 咱们能用浓缩咖啡或卡布奇诺的方式加工 你一定要喝个饱，超大杯也好大杯也罢 白砂糖，善品糖，怡口糖，或者“纤而乐” 所有人和Joe一起玩耍都能开心 我们走！
咖啡因，我是咖啡因（咖啡因） 咖啡因（唷！），咖啡因 我是糟糕的梦 我越看越酷炫 我顽皮又淘气 但我不怕带你出去疯（怕带你出去疯） 怕带你出去疯（怕带你出去疯） 怕带你出去疯（怕带你出去疯） 怕带你出去疯（怕带你出去疯） }} {{RWBY}} == 外部链接 == [[分类:美国音乐作品]][[分类:RWBY音乐]][[分类:角色歌]][[分类:插曲]] {{替换侧边栏底图 |url=RWBY.jpg |width=100% }}
